text: This video can not be playedKorean pop culture - or "K Pop" - is taking Asia by storm and has now become mainstream in Malaysia. In the ethnically diverse country, K Pop music seems to be one of the few things that appeals to young people of different races. At this fan appreciation event near Kuala Lumpur, nearly 200 people attended  - even though no K Pop stars were present.
title: K Pop fever takes hold in Malaysia
